reviewText: I liked Air Force One but have never seen In The Line of Fire so can't comment on that one. This is a gift for one of my dils but she is. Harrison Ford fan so Im sure she will be happy.

I have shopped online enough to become, sometimes, overcome by the frustration involved with someone selling me bad product. After all this I cant tell you how much I appreciate someone that delivers quality for a good price...it saves me all the pain and headache as well.

Both these films remain vital and entertaining featuring strong performances by the lead actors and gripping (if occasionally predictable) storytelling. They were great then and still great now. If you've never seen them, buy this immediately. If you saw them way back when and are a bit fuzzy, buy this immediately. If you saw either one of them and did not like it go back and watch some reality tv or whatever...

What a great combo! Harrison Ford at his best and Clint Eastwood at his best!  I had never seen In The Line of Fire, but we really enjoyed the action and the twist of the plot.  Intense action and thrilling twists that kept us on the edge of our seats till the end.

Harrison Ford and Clint Eastwood together on one disc.  It doesn't get any better than this.  In Air Force One, Ford plays the current U.S. President and former fighter jock.  He is aboard Air Force One when it is taken over by terrorists.  Ford comes to the rescue and saves the day of course.  This is a very good action film and sure to keep one on the edge of one's seat.  In the second film, In The Line of Fire, Eastwood plays a burned out Secret Services agent who once again gets the opportunity to save the president.  John Malchovich does his usual excellent job as the villain in this film.  Again, this film is sure to keep viewers on the edge of their seat.  These are two excellent action films starring two legendary movie heroes that are more than worth the price.
... and Amazon won't fix it even after I pointed it out!  Widescreen is what they are and what people want in blu-ray.  2 great movies for a great price!
Excellent addition to my collection of action/drama movies featuring these excellent actors.  Don't hesitate to buy them.

Both Air Force One and In The Line of Fire were excellent because they were both directed by the great Wolfgang Petersen. Harrison Ford was fantastic as the President of the United States who also kicked butt against the bad guys on the Air Force One plane. Clint Eastwood played a Secret Service agent up against a ruthless assassin (played by John Malkovich). Malkovich was also terrific as the villain.

both. They are excellent movies. Suggest the for everyone. Not something
to miss. Get it, watch it. You'll love them!
Two great movies for the price of one.  Actually much less than one.  The price was certainly a bargain and I got to watch two of my favorite actors, Ford and Eastwood.

Great action films with all star cast and just satisfying to watch.  Harrison Ford and Clint Eastwood are terrific and fun to watch.  Supporting cast in both films complement the main stars.  Well worth the money.
We like classic action. Harrison Ford played some pretty class action adventure roles, so these were movies we wanted on hand.
Great pairing of movies but how can you go wrong with Harrison Ford and Clint Eastwood?  Looking for some great popcorn movies for a Friday night....this is the combo.

I always enjoyed the movie, and the upgrade to Blue Ray is well worth it.
Highly recommend purchasing the Blue Ray edition.

Awesome movies starring Harrison Ford and Clint Eastwood. Air Force One's music is amazing, which adds more thrill to the thriller. Great plot of story in In the Line of Fire.
